text: Christian Atta Gyan (2 November 1978 â€“ 29 December 2021) was a Ghanaian-Dutch professional footballer. He played as a defender. Gyan played for the Ghana national football team 23 times between 1998 until 2002. Gyan was diagnosed with terminal pancreatic cancer in November 2021.Feyenoord-cultheld Christian Gyan (43) ongeneeslijk ziek He died from the disease a month later on 29 December 2021 at the age of 43.Feyenoord-cultheld Christian Gyan op 43-jarige leeftijd overleden ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Dutch footballers Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Christian Gyan
